column4: i just installed virtual pc 2007 on my xp machine, an i am trying to load the ubuntu 8.04 image, it wont do it , any ideas how to install ubuntu as a virtual machine ?
so go to a forum where they support Virtual PC
not to be a jerk about it but they will be able to help you better there then we wil lhere
this is a support channel for UBUNTU not VirtualPC

thought you did not want to be a jerk about it........i dont know of a virtual pc channel, and i am asking if UBUNTU can be installed on it, you can add me to your ignore list if you dont know the answer
